thread.title: Republic Airways’ Labor Trouble Deepens
thread.title_full: Republic Airways’ Labor Trouble Deepens - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Republic Airways’ Labor Trouble Deepens
text:
DALLAS—The Teamsters group representing pilots at Republic Airways is balking at allowing a vote on the company’s contract offer, deepening the rift between labor and management at the regional airline.
The Indianapolis company’s shares dropped 37% Wednesday.
Republic has threatened to begin a restructuring process if pilots don’t approve... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
